name: Square Ninja (Dhruva)
description:
Destroy your triangle enemies as the Square Ninja!

The squares were wiped out by the triangles during a 42 year war. You were the only square left and now it is up to you, the last of the squares to survive the onslaught of the triangle army.

You have two powers as the Square Ninja, the first is speed. Dash to kill enemies and to evade them. The second power you have control over is time, slow down time for absolute awareness on the battlefield.

Controls: Dash by holding the dash icon on the bottom right of the screen.
